text: The State Flag of Veracruz has a white background with the state coat of arms. == Historical flags == Bandera de Zongolica.png| Flag of Siara 1824 (ratio 4:7) Flag of Veracruz.svg| Flag of Veracruz 1999-2009 (ratio 4:7) Flag of Veracruz State (state).png| Flag of Veracruz 2010 (ratio 4:7) ==Related pages== * List of Mexican flags Veracruz Category:Veracruz Veracruz
title: Flag of Veracruz
